title: Any news on the Poppy update?
body: Was just wondering if we are going to get any news on the Poppy update you talked about recently, I'm getting a little impatient because she is my favourite champion

replies.body: I wouldn't hold too much hope for something to be done recently, we have just had gangplank and are about to get fiora, both of which are almost completely new champs, so i don't think we will be getting a new champ or a new champ update for a while now. hopefully I'm wrong tho.
go look at http://www.newsoflegends.com/ there was a Q and A involving champion reworks. i didn't read that much into it but it seems she will be more tankier and less .
